sentence.Network_en: Root ginger has been used medicinally for centuries.
sentence.Network_cn: 几百年来姜根一直作为药用。

sentence.Network_en: Asia having off - white flowers and aromatic seeds used medicinally and in curry.
sentence.Network_cn: 南欧和东亚的一年生草本植物,开黄白色花,种子芳香,可药用或制咖喱.

sentence.Network_en: Acting medicinally by absorption through the skin.
sentence.Network_cn: 皮下的通过皮肤吸收而产生医疗作用的.

herb widely distributed in tropics and subtropics used for forage and medicinally as a demulcent and having a fine soft bast stronger than jute ;广泛分布在热带和亚热带的一种药草，被用做草料和医药上的镇痛剂，有优良的软的比黄麻结实的韧皮；
tall herb of eastern North America and Asia having blue berrylike fruit and a thick knotty rootstock formerly used medicinally .北美东部和亚洲的高的药草，有兰色的象浆果似的果实和粗的多节的根茎，原来被用在医学上。
They used garlic medicinally ., 他们把大蒜当药用.

entry.def: Medicinal substances or substances with medicinal effects can be used to treat and cure illnesses.
